summary: Client-facing SOP for requesting, approving, and completing jobs in ProBridge ABQ.

steps.text: Visit the ProBridge ABQ request page and select the service category that best matches your project (e.g., handyman, cleaning, moving).
Enter your ABQ address, preferred time window, and a clear description of the work that needs to be done.
Provide your name, email, and phone number so we can send you a quote and updates.
Submit the request. You will receive a link to track your job and view your quote once it is prepared.
When your quote is ready, open the job status link sent to your email or SMS.
Review the all-in price and the summary of the scope of work.
If anything looks unclear or out of scope, contact support or reply to the message before approving.
If you are satisfied, approve the quote and proceed to Stripe Checkout to complete payment.
Ensure someone is available at the property during the agreed time window.
Prepare the work area where possible to avoid delays (e.g., clear furniture, secure pets).
Communicate any last-minute changes as early as possible through the provided contact channels.
After the work is completed, verify that the main items discussed in the scope have been addressed.
If there are minor issues, raise them directly during the visit or via support shortly after completion.
Provide feedback or rating for the contractor if prompted; this helps improve matching for future jobs.
If you need to change the scheduled time, request a change as early as possible so the operator and contractor can adjust.
If you need to cancel, contact support and reference your job ID; the operator will explain any applicable policies.

notes: Clients in ABQ interact primarily with the request form, quote page, and Stripe Checkout.
All pricing shown to clients is a single, all-in number for the agreed scope of work.
